name: Spies Of Dice
description:
You are a dice block spy infiltrating a base in the dice universe. You must steal all the artifacts without stepping into the light. With each stage you'll progress to a different side of the dice block.

You've come equipped with a powerful weapon, but it only activates when you step into the light, which remains a big risk. They say it can destroy both blue blocks and artifacts, but you don't wanna destroy that last one!

Coding: Roelof Tennekes

Art, sound and music: Bart Tennekes
